errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized access: Caller does not have the required permissions.

errors.name: InvalidData
errors.msg: Invalid Data: There is an error in the data provided.

errors.name: OperationNotAllowed
errors.msg: This operation is currently not allowed.

errors.name: BpsOutOfRange
errors.msg: Bps out of range: Bps must be between 0 and 10000.

errors.name: IsNotCurrentlyTransferring
errors.msg: The token is not currently transferring

errors.name: MintRestricted
errors.msg: Minting is restricted to whitelisted accounts only.

errors.name: BurnRestricted
errors.msg: Burning is restricted to whitelisted accounts only.

errors.name: PendingBurnRequestExists
errors.msg: A pending burn request already exists.

errors.name: InvalidExecutor
errors.msg: Signer is not the registered executor account
